summary: MSc Computer Science student at Saarland University with strong focus on Python-based data analysis and applied machine learning. Hands-on experience building end-to-end ML pipelines, automation systems, and real-time dashboards. Second author on an IEEE publication on deep-learning-based scene understanding and automated report generation. Actively developing large-scale projects in computer vision, time-series analysis, and algorithmic trading systems.

bullet_pool: Developed a real-time soil surveillance system using ESP8266 and DHT11 sensors, reducing manual monitoring time by 40%.
Built a web dashboard to visualize live field data, achieving 99% data transmission accuracy from hardware to cloud.
Collected and analyzed 10,000+ sensor readings to build a predictive model for soil moisture trends (~90% accuracy).
Integrated hardware with cloud APIs (ThingSpeak) to automate irrigation, improving water efficiency by 25%.
Worked on embedded-to-cloud data pipelines, reliability testing, and basic predictive analytics for sensor streams.
Developed Python-based solutions for data analysis, preprocessing, and feature engineering.
Built ML models achieving ~90% accuracy and improved performance by 25% through iterative tuning and validation.
Integrated components of a real-time traffic system, improving processing efficiency by 15%.
Automated USGS satellite data retrieval and processing, reducing manual workload by 70%.
Strengthened skills in automation, scripting, and data-driven system design.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: Stock_AI – Algorithmic Trading & Market Analysis Platform
bullet_pool: Designed and implemented an end-to-end algorithmic trading and market analysis platform for Indian stock markets.
Built automated pipelines for collecting OHLCV candle data, indicators, and signals using broker APIs and yfinance.
Implemented a paper-trading engine with order execution logic, position tracking, PnL computation, and risk controls.
Added rule-based strategies and ML-assisted signal generation for time-series financial data.
Developed FastAPI backend and PostgreSQL schema to store trades, positions, candles, and strategy results.
Created a React dashboard to visualize live prices, signals, trades, and performance metrics.
Focused on robustness, logging, reproducibility, and modular experiment design.

projects.title: Automated USGS Satellite Image Downloads
bullet_pool: Built an automated pipeline for USGS satellite image downloads using Python and Flask.
Automated retrieval, filtering, and organization, reducing manual workload by 70%.
Added caching and error handling to maintain a 95% success rate under unstable network conditions.
Improved data accuracy by 20% through validation and structured processing.

projects.title: Traffic Prediction
bullet_pool: Developed a traffic prediction system using historical traffic and road-segment data.
Constructed a connection matrix to model spatial relationships between road segments.
Trained regression models and visualized predictions using interactive maps.

projects.title: SmartVision (Vehicle Count Estimator App)
bullet_pool: Developed a computer vision application to estimate vehicle counts from video streams.
Applied image processing techniques for detection and counting in real-world conditions.

projects.title: UNet Image Processing
bullet_pool: Implemented a UNet-based deep learning pipeline for image segmentation.
Prepared datasets and generated masks to support training and evaluation.

projects.title: Online Results Portal
bullet_pool: Built an online results portal to manage and display student results.
Implemented basic database-backed views and user-facing pages.

projects.title: JrPortfolio
bullet_pool: Created a personal portfolio website to present projects and skills.
Designed responsive pages using basic frontend technologies.

projects.title: Digital Voting System Using Raspberry Pi
bullet_pool: Built a Raspberry Pi–based voting system prototype integrating hardware and software components.
Implemented a workflow to record and manage votes with a focus on reliability.

projects.title: Real-Time Soil Surveillance of Agriculture
bullet_pool: Developed a real-time soil monitoring prototype to capture sensor readings for agricultural surveillance.
Integrated sensors and basic analytics for monitoring and reporting.

publications.title: Linked Generative Adversarial Networks for Vector Map Generation using Remote Sensing Images
publications.venue: 2025 International Conference on Machine Intelligence for GeoAnalytics and Remote Sensing (MIGARS), IEEE
bullet_pool: Worked on GAN-based model for automated vector map generation from remote sensing images.
Contributed to experimentation, evaluation metrics, and dataset analysis using OSM datasets.

extracurricular_activities: State-level Badminton Player (SL4 Category) | Active Hackathon participant | Passionate Project Creator | Dedicated Volunteer for community events
